page.title: 18CHILDREN'S LEISURE 2 TELFORD
page.content: {ORGANISED LEISURE ACTIVITIES OF 31 {CHILDREN. { {Play scheme ******** 08 {Punjabi classes ******* 07 {Swimming lessons **** 04 {Football team *** 03 {Music lessons *** 03 {Gymnastics club ** 02 {Badminton club ** 02 {Sunday school ** 02 {Girl Guides * 01 {Computer club * 01 {Athletic club * 01 {Horse riding * 01 {Cricket team * 01 Of the organised activities the Playscheme was the most popular.Most of the Sikh children in the area attend the Punjabi classes which are held twice weekly. { }
